items.sentence: I don\'t see why everyone thinks this book is so good.
Tom\'s thinking of moving so he\'ll be closer to Mary.
Tom\'s younger brother is dating Mary\'s older sister.
You do not have to go to the dance unless you want to.
Aren\'t you hot? Why don\'t you take off your sweater?
My opinion about that topic has changed several times.
My wife and I are planning to visit Boston next month.
My youngest brother was brought up by our grandmother.
Tom and Mary couldn\'t agree on how it should be done.
I suspect Tom and Mary weren\'t the ones who did that.
Tom isn\'t the one who wrote the songs I sang tonight.
Tom isn\'t the only one here who knows how to do that.
I\'m very disappointed with the way things turned out.
I\'ve decided to quit my job at the end of this month.
Tom said he didn\'t think Mary would like his friends.
Tom said he didn\'t want to feed his dog dry dog food.
Tom said he didn\'t want to go to the dance with Mary.
Tom said he didn\'t want to stay in Boston any longer.
Tom doesn\'t even let his daughter go out on weekends.
I got mad at Tom because he was making a lot of noise.
